alert.note: Alert for Eastern Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 08 at 3:39PM EST until January 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, 2 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...For the Coastal Flood Warning, areas along the Albemarle Sound, Currituck Sound, Back Bay and adjacent tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory, beaches along the Atlantic coast including the northern Outer Banks and Virginia Beach. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Warning, from 1 PM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 1 PM Tuesday to 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS..Severe flooding will cause extensive inundation and flooding of numerous roads and buildings resulting in a significant threat to property and life. Water will be 2 to 3 feet or more above ground level in some areas. Severe flooding will extend inland from the waterfront and shoreline flooding homes, businesses and isolating some neighborhoods. Numerous roads will be impassable under several feet of water and cars submerged. Some areas will need to be evacuated. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. COROLLA NC MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.5 FT, MODERATE 6.0 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/05 PM 3.6 -0.1 1.1 3 NONE 09/05 AM 4.8 1.1 1.0 3-4 NONE 09/05 PM 3.2 -0.5 0.6 8-9 NONE 10/06 AM 3.5 -0.2 -0.5 7-8 NONE 10/06 PM 2.4 -1.3 -0.4 5 NONE 11/07 AM 4.2 0.5 0.1 3 NONE &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Large breaking waves will result in dangerous surf conditions and possible beach erosion. Do not enter or approach the water due to the risk of being swept away.
